text.text:
What should be a lifeless helmet belonging to a suit of armor 
now hums with the presence of a fallen warrior's soul.

The old chestplate is still in solid condition. 
The detached gauntlets extend the range of the arcane spirit within.

The legs of the suit remain sturdy, 
but worn from years of use.

The boots are well kept, besides a coating of mud. If you were to lose the rest of your armour, 
these boots seem light enough to travel with great haste.
